column183:
I'd love a second pair of eyes on this one, too! I'm not sure if the PUD & mobile house uses are correct.

BH - This is a conservation district primarily, so PUDs and mobile home parks are unlikely.  I changed the ADU to permitted/conditional the same as other districts.

column183:
Flagging for review. This is a nonresidential district, but nothing prohibits PUDs and mobile home parks in this district...

BH - this is definitely an industrial district with only industrial and some commercial activities allowed.  mobile homes are residential and PUDs have residential as well.  I think it's correct the way you have it coded.
